projectGridLines.stationName: Viacom -D2C Subscriptions – (Payment Gateways and competition mapping)
projectGridLines.title: Title of project Product and Payment Initiatives
projectGridLines.description:
Brief Description of project

The objective of this project is to develop a comprehensive understanding of the OTT space through in-depth market research and analysis, aimed at identifying trends and opportunities within the subscription market. You will monitor and report on the performance of various product and payment initiatives, assessing their impact and success. This project will provide valuable insights into user behaviors, market dynamics, and the effectiveness of different strategies, contributing to more informed decision-making and strategic planning for enhancing subscription growth and user engagement in the OTT space.

Project domain (IT, Finance, etc.)

Subscription Revenue

Project area

Product & Payment Initiatives

Skill set required to execute the project (Technical)

• Ability to analyze data and come up with metrics that will help in data driven decision making

• Microsoft PPT & Excel 

• Primary & Secondary Market research

• Understanding of payment eco system 

• Basic knowledge of SVOD and product features of OTT industry.



Other soft skill competencies required

• Excellent problem-solving skills

• Presenting insights/thoughts/results to stakeholders

• Effective communication

• Regular updates to senior leadership and stakeholders



Any specific courses that student should have taken 

Basic Mathematics, Statistics

Any other requirements


Expected learning (in bullet points)

During this project you will learn the following skills:

• Problem solving & understanding of metrics

• Advanced Analytical capabilities

• Business understanding

• Effective communication
